item.title: Scania S540 Canivete v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 1, 2025

Scania S540 Canivete v1.0 ETS2

Scania S540 Canivete is a popular term among Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) enthusiasts in Brazil to refer to mods of Scania S-series (Next Gen) trucks that feature an elongated chassis and often a lower suspension or customizations that give the impression that the truck “bends” or is more flexible, like a canivete.

Common features of “Canivete” mods for the Scania S540 in ETS2:
Elongated Chassis: One of the main features is an extended chassis, which can be 6×2, 6×4, 8×4 or even longer configurations, providing an imposing appearance and often allowing for greater virtual load capacity.
Extensive Customization: These mods are highly configurable. You can expect a wide range of options to customize your truck, including:
Cabs: Various cab height options (Standard, Highline, Topline, Executive, Longline Executive).
Chassis: Various axle configurations (4×2, 6×2, 6×4, 8×4, etc.), including rear-wheel steering options.
Accessories: A multitude of exterior and interior accessories, such as:
Lights: Auxiliary headlights, LEDs, position lights in different shapes and colors, allowing you to create a “Christmas tree” look if desired.
Sun visors: Standard, plastic, chrome or illuminated sun visor options.
Grilles: Different types of front grilles (chrome, black, XT).
Exhausts: Custom side or rear exhausts.
Horns: Various types of horns, including realistic sounding marine and train horns.
Interior: Dashboard options (including compatibility with Steam dashboard mods), interior colors (gray, beige), and hanging accessories (GPS, Starlink antennas, etc.).
Skins: Support for various skins from real and fictional companies.
Realistic Sounds: Many mods come with custom sound packs that aim to faithfully replicate the sound of Scania engines, including direct exhaust sounds and horns.
Animations: May include animations of steering wheel, windows, and other interactive elements.
Compatibility: These are usually updated to the latest versions of ETS2 (such as 1.50, 1.53, 1.54), but it is always important to check the specific mod for compatibility.

To install a truck mod in ETS2, follow these general steps:
1. Download the mod file: The file will have the extension .scs. If it is in compressed format (.zip or .rar), extract it first.
2. Move the file to the “mod” folder: Copy the .scs file(s) to the `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod` folder.
3. Activate in the Mod Manager:
Open ETS2.
In the main menu, go to the Mod Manager.
Find the Scania S540 Canivete mod in the list and activate it by moving it to the right column.
Important: Some mods, especially more complex ones or those that depend on other mods (such as accessory or sound packs), may require a specific order of activation in the mod manager. Always read the instructions provided by the mod creator.
Click “Confirm Changes”.
4. Purchase the truck in-game: Head to the Scania dealership or the in-game mod dealership to purchase and customize your Scania S540 “Switchblade”.
Please note that the quality and features of mods can vary greatly between creators. It is always a good idea to watch demo videos and read reviews before downloading to ensure that the mod meets your expectations.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.description:

Volvo NL12 EDC Gold Leo Gamer v1.0 ETS2

Volvo NL12 EDC Gold by Leo Gamer is a very popular truck mod among Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) players in Brazil. It stands out for bringing a touch of nostalgia with a classic Volvo truck, the NL12, but with a level of detail and customization options that make it “Gold”.

Features of the Volvo NL12 EDC Gold Mod:
This mod is known for offering a rich and customizable experience:
Detailed Modeling: The truck is generally well modeled, with attention to detail both on the exterior and interior, seeking to replicate the real Volvo NL12 EDC.
Chassis Variety: It usually includes several chassis options (such as 4×2, 6×2 and 6×4), allowing you to choose the configuration that best suits your play style and type of cargo.
Engine and Transmission Options: The mod offers a range of engines (with different power outputs, including “chip-based” options for more performance) and transmissions, which can be either the original ones or some non-original ones for more versatility.
Extensive Customization: This is one of its strong points. You can customize many aspects of the truck, including:
Paints/Skins: In addition to the pre-existing skins, there is usually the option to create your own skins or use the ones that come in the package.
External Accessories: Several options for bumpers, headlights, antennas, spoilers, owls (typical visual details of Brazilian trucks), and other stickers and adornments.
Internal Accessories: Customization of the interior with items such as lampshades, PX radios, GPS (often with tablet models such as iPad Air), and other objects to make the cabin your own.
Realistic Sounds: Many Leo Gamer mods, and this one is no exception, come with custom sound packs or are compatible with high-quality sound mods (such as those from Rafa Sound), which provide a sound immersion that is faithful to Brazilian trucks.
Compatibility: It is important to always check the version of ETS2 that the mod is compatible with, as game updates may require new versions of the mod.

To install the mod:
1. Download the (.scs) file: After downloading, you will have one or more files with the `.scs` extension.
2. Move to the “mod” folder: Paste these files into the `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod` folder.
3. Activate in Mod Manager: Open ETS2, go to the “Mod Manager” in the main menu. Find the Volvo NL12 EDC Gold mod in the list and activate it by moving it to the right column. Remember to apply the changes.
4. In-game purchase: Go to a Volvo dealership (or a mod dealership, depending on the mod version) in-game to purchase and customize your NL12.
Tip: Many of these Brazilian mods for ETS2 come with a password to unzip the file. This password is usually provided in the mod’s presentation video on YouTube.
If you like classic Brazilian trucks with lots of customization options, Leo Gamer’s Volvo NL12 EDC Gold is an excellent addition to your ETS2!

item.title: Scania lk 1series v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 1, 2025

Scania lk 1series v1.0 ETS2

The Scania L/LK 1 Series is a range of classic Scania trucks that have left their mark on the history of transport, especially in Brazil, where models such as the LK 140 and LK 141 have become icons. They are often associated with “cara-chata” (forward cab) trucks and, in particular, with the brand’s legendary V8 engines.

History and Features of the Scania L/LK 1 Series
The Scania L/LK 1 series was introduced in the 1970s, with the LK 140 being the first to arrive, in 1975. It is notable for:
Pioneering the V8 in Brazil: The LK 140 was the first Scania V8-powered truck to be launched in the country, and also one of the first forward cab (cara-chata) trucks in Brazil. Its 14.2-liter V8 engine developed 350 horsepower, which was impressive power for the time.
Gearbox: It came with the imported GR 810 gearbox with 10 synchronized gears.
Axle Configurations: It was offered in 4×2 and 6×4 versions, and in 1976 the 6×2 option was launched.
LK 141: In 1978, the LK 141 arrived, which maintained the mechanics of the 140, but with power increased to 375 horsepower.
LK 111: In addition to the V8s, the series also included the LK 111, which used the same 11-liter engine as the famous Scania “Jacaré”.
Cultural Icon: The LK line gained even more fame in Brazil with its appearance in the TV series “Carga Pesada”, where the characters Pedro and Bino traveled around the country in an LK 141, immortalizing the model in the popular imagination.
End of Production: Production of the LK line ended in July 1981, giving way to the Scania 2 series.
Scania L/LK 1 Series as a Mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2)
Due to its iconic status, the Scania L/LK 1 Series is a truck much sought after by ETS2 players who want to relive the golden age of classic trucks. There are several mods available that seek to faithfully recreate these models.

What to expect from a Scania L/LK 1 Series mod for ETS2:
Authentic Modeling: Good quality mods usually have very detailed external and internal modeling, replicating the visual characteristics of the period.
Cab and Chassis Options: It is common to find different types of cabins (such as the “flat-face” cabin and, in some cases, even the European “Longline” or “Torpedo”, which resemble the “Jacaré”), as well as several chassis configurations (4×2, 6×2, 6×4).
Realistic Sounds: Many mods come with custom engine sounds that emulate the characteristic roar of Scania V8 engines of the period, providing a more immersive sound experience.
Extensive Tuning: Customization is a strong point, with many options for external accessories (bumpers, auxiliary headlights, antennas, exhausts, stickers, etc.) and internal accessories (PX radio, GPS, curtains, among others), allowing you to create a unique truck, in the style of the time or with modern touches.
Various Engines and Transmissions: Generally include several engine options (with power close to the real ones or “chipped” for the game) and transmissions.

To install:
1. Download the mod file (.scs): Make sure to download a version compatible with your current version of Euro Truck Simulator 2.
2. Move to the “mod” folder: Paste the `.scs` file inside the `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod` folder.
3. Activate in the Mod Manager: Start ETS2, go to the “Mod Manager” in the main menu and activate the Scania L/LK 1 Series mod. Keep in mind that truck mods are usually activated at higher levels in the mod manager.
4. Buy from Dealer: After activating, go to a Scania dealership (or the mod dealership if the mod is standalone) in-game to purchase and customize your truck.
The Scania L/LK 1 Series is a fantastic choice for classic truck lovers looking to add a piece of transportation history to their ETS2!

Credits: BOSCO

item.title: CONSTELLATION MECHANICAL HORSE v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 1, 2025

CONSTELLATION MECHANICAL HORSE v1.0 ETS2

The Volkswagen Constellation is a very popular line of trucks in Brazil, known for its robustness, technology and versatility. As a tractor unit, the Constellation is widely used in medium and long-distance road freight transportation, including operations with double trailers and road trains.

Constellation Tractor Unit Models
The Constellation line offers several tractor unit models, varying in power, axle configuration and applications. Some of the best-known include:
Constellation 19.330, 19.360, 19.380 (4×2): These are 4×2 models ideal for trailers weighing up to 45 tons of PBTC (Gross Combined Weight). They have Cummins engines with power ranging from 330 hp to 380 hp, offering good performance and fuel economy. The cabins can be extended, with a low-roof bed or a high-roof bed.
Constellation 25.360, 25.420, 25.460 (6×2): These are tridendum models (6×2) that provide greater load capacity and stability. Recommended for operations with 3-axle trailers and light double trailers. They also feature Cummins engines and manual or automated transmissions (V-Tronic).
Constellation 26.420, 33.460 (6×4): These are tridendum and tridendum tractor units (6×4), designed for heavier applications, such as transporting grains, sugarcane and loads that require greater tractive force and load capacity (up to 63 tons of gross vehicle weight for the 26.420). They feature more powerful Cummins engines and robust transmissions.
Constellation 33.260 (8×4): This is an 8×4 traction model, generally used in off-road applications or for transporting indivisible and very heavy loads, such as in construction and mining.

General Features of the Constellation Tractor:
Engine: Mainly Cummins (ISL, ISF) or MAN (D08, D26) engines, depending on the model and year, offering varied power for different transport needs.
Transmission: Options of manual (ZF) or automated (V-Tronic) gearboxes, which provide comfort and efficiency.
Cabin: The cabins are designed to offer comfort and ergonomics to the driver, with low roof, high roof and bed options, as well as items such as air conditioning, pneumatic seats and multifunctional panels.
Technology: Newer models incorporate technologies such as ABS, EBD, ATC, HSA (Hill Start Assist), ESC (Electronic Stability Control), as well as digital panels and connectivity systems.

Volkswagen Constellation Tractor in Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2)
The Volkswagen Constellation is one of the most desired trucks by the Brazilian ETS2 community. Thanks to talented modders, it is possible to drive this iconic truck in the game, with a high level of detail and customization.

What to expect from a Constellation Mod for ETS2:
Faithful Modeling: Quality mods seek to replicate the Constellation faithfully, both on the exterior and interior of the cabin.
Various Configurations: They usually offer several chassis options (4×2, 6×2, 6×4), cabin types (low roof, high roof, bed) and engines/transmissions corresponding to the real models.
Realistic Sounds: Many mods come with custom sound packs that imitate the characteristic roar of Cummins or MAN engines, increasing immersion.
Extensive Customization: One of the great advantages of Brazilian mods. You can customize your Constellation with:
Paints/Skins: Several skins from real and fictional companies.
External Accessories: Bumpers, auxiliary headlights, antennas, exhausts, mud flaps, “owls”, LED lights and other adornments.
Internal Accessories: GPS, PX radios, curtains, stickers, dolls, and other objects to decorate the cabin.
Compatibility: It is essential to check the compatibility of the mod with the current version of your ETS2, as the game receives frequent updates.

General Installation Steps (if downloading from external links):
1. Download the mod file: It will usually come in .scs format (or compressed in .rar/.zip that needs to be extracted to .scs).
2. Move to the “mod” folder: Copy the `.scs` file(s) to the `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod` folder.
3. Activate in the Mod Manager:
Open ETS2.
From the main menu, go to the Mod Manager.
Find the Volkswagen Constellation mod in the list and activate it by moving it to the right column.
Pay attention to the order: Some mods, especially those that come with separate sounds or accessories, may require a specific order of activation. Always read the instructions from the mod creator.
Click “Confirm Changes”.
4. In-Game Purchase: Go to a Volkswagen dealership (or the “Mod Dealer” if the mod is standalone) in-game to purchase and customize your Constellation.
The Volkswagen Constellation is an essential addition for those who want to simulate Brazilian roads in ETS2!

Credits: TECH GAMES
